Html:
Hi.
Is there a limit for the size of the xls file.
I am having problems to create excel5 files. Some worksheets have pictures and photos, and so, the document size get very big.
When this happen the file is not created and no error message is displayed.
Is there a limit for the document size?
I set time limit 0 in PHP, so I think is not a php limitation.

Thanks
This is a known issue in PEARSpreadsheetExcel, which is actually the underlying document generator for Excel5 files.
